success.create: Your data clip was successfully created.
success.mark_open: Data clip successfully reopened and returned!
success.delete: Your data clip was successfully deleted.
success.mark_merged: Your data clip was successfully merged.

create.title: Your data clip has been created
create.description: You can now view the new data clip.

ready.title: Changes successfully submitted!
ready.description: Your changes have been submitted for review. We'll notify you with any notes or change in status.

source_override.title: Accept values from data clip
source_override.description: This will update all conflicted values to match the data clip on merge.

clip_override.title: Reject values from data clip
clip_override.description: This won't change anything in the source sheet, and the conflicted data clip changes will be discarded.

resolve_conflicts.title: Make changes individually
resolve_conflicts.description: This allows you to review each conflict in the data clip, and decide which values to merge or ignore.

empty.title: No changes have been detected in this data clip.
empty.description: Make at least one change in order to merge.

applyAll.description_one: Would you like apply '{{resolveTo}}' as your selection for the remaining conflicts in the '{{columnLabel}}' column? {{count}} record will be updated.
applyAll.description_other: Would you like apply '{{resolveTo}}' as your selection for the remaining conflicts in the '{{columnLabel}}' column? {{count}} records will be updted.

conflictResolution.title: Choose which change to merge
conflictResolution.description: There are changes in both the source sheet and the data clip. Choose which one you want to keep.
conflictResolution.change_description: 1 record in the field "{{fieldName}}" will be changed.

share.title: Share data clip
share.description: Collaborators will be sent an invitation to collaborate on this data clip.

newConflicts.title: New conflicts found
newConflicts.description: New conflicts have been introduced while reviewing this data clip.
